useCase.name: Create Fault Management Job and Report
useCase.description: A Buyer/Client creates a Fault Management Job and Report.

mainSequence.step: The Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
The Fault Management Job is created.
The Fault Management Job enters the "inProgress" state.
Data is generated for the Fault Management Job.
A Fault Management Report is created as a result of the Job.
The Fault Management Report enters the "inProgress" state.
Data is collected for the Fault Management Report.
The Fault Management Report is completed.
